title: Air, Volume 4: A History of the Future
description: Blythe, a young, acrophobic stewardess, discovers a strange, new reality beyond the ordinary world of air travel. In this final AIR volume, Blythe returns to work to find a the Hyperwing 307, the sleekest and most advanced airship ever built. It will be hers to pilot â€“ if she survives a series of baffling tests. Then, on her way to a final confrontation with the Etesians, Blythe must untangle a mystery surrounding the disappearance of legendary aviator/author Antoine De Saint Exupery and discover the hidden meaning of a lost manuscript by Jules Verne.
author: G. Willow Wilson
